DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare two different style intramuscular injection ( Bunch versus Z-Track ) flu vaccination follow outcome measure basis comparison : perceive pain , redness , medication leakage , complication within 72 hour healthy adult volunteer subject .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Methods Immunization Intramuscular Injections
DOC.detailed_description: This study design compare two different style intramuscular injection ( Bunch versus Z-Track ) flu vaccination follow outcome measure basis comparison : perceive pain , redness , medication leakage , complication within 72 hour healthy adult volunteer subject .
DOC.criteria: healthy adult without latex allergy 18 year age latex allergy illness 18 year less
